body:
```
$ spack graph cmake
o  cmake
```

```
$ spack spec cmake
Input spec
------------------------------
  cmake

Normalized
------------------------------
  cmake

Concretized
------------------------------
  cmake@3.6.0%gcc@6.1.0~doc+ncurses+openssl~qt arch=linux-centos6-x86_64
      ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@6.1.0 arch=linux-centos6-x86_64
      ^openssl@1.0.2h%gcc@6.1.0 arch=linux-centos6-x86_64
          ^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@6.1.0 arch=linux-centos6-x86_64
```
title: spack graph doesn't take into account default=True dependencies
